-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Schema LittleLemonDM
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS `LittleLemonDM` DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8 ;
USE `LittleLemonDM` ;

-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `LittleLemonDM`.`StaffInfo`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `LittleLemonDM`.`StaffInfo` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `LittleLemonDM`.`StaffInfo` (
  `StaffID` INT NOT NULL,
  `EmpName` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  `EmpRole` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  `EmpSalary` DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`StaffID`))
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `LittleLemonDM`.`CustomerDetails`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `LittleLemonDM`.`CustomerDetails` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `LittleLemonDM`.`CustomerDetails` (
  `CustomerID` VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  `Name` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  `Email` VARCHAR(255) NULL,
  `ContactNumber` VARCHAR(25) NULL,
  `City` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  `CountryCode` VARCHAR(5) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`CustomerID`))
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `LittleLemonDM`.`Bookings`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `LittleLemonDM`.`Bookings` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `LittleLemonDM`.`Bookings` (
  `BookingID` INT NOT NULL,
  `CustomerID` VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  `StaffID` INT NOT NULL,
  `BookingDate` DATETIME NOT NULL,
  `TableNo` INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`BookingID`),
  INDEX `StaffID_idx` (`StaffID` ASC) VISIBLE,
  INDEX `fk_Bookings_CustomerID_idx` (`CustomerID` ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_Bookings_StaffID`
    FOREIGN KEY (`StaffID`)
    REFERENCES `LittleLemonDM`.`StaffInfo` (`StaffID`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_Bookings_CustomerID`
    FOREIGN KEY (`CustomerID`)
    REFERENCES `LittleLemonDM`.`CustomerDetails` (`CustomerID`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `LittleLemonDM`.`Orders`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `LittleLemonDM`.`Orders` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `LittleLemonDM`.`Orders` (
  `OrderID` VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  `CustomerID` VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  `OrderDate` DATETIME NOT NULL,
  `ItemQuantity` INT NOT NULL,
  `TotalPrice` DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`OrderID`),
  INDEX `fk_CustomerID_Orders_idx` (`CustomerID` ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_CustomerID_Orders`
    FOREIGN KEY (`CustomerID`)
    REFERENCES `LittleLemonDM`.`CustomerDetails` (`CustomerID`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `LittleLemonDM`.`OrderDeliveryStatus`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `LittleLemonDM`.`OrderDeliveryStatus` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `LittleLemonDM`.`OrderDeliveryStatus` (
  `DeliveryID` INT NOT NULL,
  `OrderID` VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  `DeliveryDate` DATETIME NOT NULL,
  `DeliveryCost` DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  `DeliveryStatus` VARCHAR(45) NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`DeliveryID`),
  INDEX `fk_OrderDeliveryStatus_OrderID_idx` (`OrderID` ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_OrderDeliveryStatus_OrderID`
    FOREIGN KEY (`OrderID`)
    REFERENCES `LittleLemonDM`.`Orders` (`OrderID`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `LittleLemonDM`.`MenuItems`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `LittleLemonDM`.`MenuItems` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `LittleLemonDM`.`MenuItems` (
  `MenuItemID` VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  `ItemName` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  `Category` VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL,
  `Cuisine` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`MenuItemID`))
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `LittleLemonDM`.`OrderMenuItems`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `LittleLemonDM`.`OrderMenuItems` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `LittleLemonDM`.`OrderMenuItems` (
  `OrderMenuItemID` INT NOT NULL,
  `OrderID` VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  `MenuItemID` VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  `Quantity` INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`OrderMenuItemID`),
  INDEX `OrderID_idx` (`OrderID` ASC) VISIBLE,
  INDEX `fk_OrderMenuItems_MenuItemID_idx` (`MenuItemID` ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_OrderMenuItems_OrderID`
    FOREIGN KEY (`OrderID`)
    REFERENCES `LittleLemonDM`.`Orders` (`OrderID`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_OrderMenuItems_MenuItemID`
    FOREIGN KEY (`MenuItemID`)
    REFERENCES `LittleLemonDM`.`MenuItems` (`MenuItemID`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;
